reviewText: VERY COOL!! As a avid cyclist i thoroughly enjoyed this. Gorgeous Blu Ray picture quality and sound. Great price. I purchased 2012 Blu Ray TDF too. I would buy more cycling DVD 's if there more avaible from 2013 on but......

This blu-ray set is awesome.  The only bad thing I can think of is that these stages are seriously cropped to fit on the disks.  This is the TDF season that got me interested in road biking.  I'm a Team Sky fan now, I even saw them in person this past fall in Richmond VA.
Great to watch especially in light of Chris Froome's 2015 win!
Great!  I loved it.  Nice videography and the commentation was entertaining.  I watch it on my trainer and it makes me look forward to pedaling in place in my basement.
